availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Jane Greathouse Bealmear in Nelson County, Kentucky, on November 8, 1838. Father of Henry Bealmear, John S. Bealmear, and Anna Eliza Bealmear. Married to Sarah Strother Bealmear in Nelson County on January 17, 1854. Farmer in Nelson County in 1850. Owned five enslaved persons in Nelson County in 1850. Farmer in Nelson County in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in Nelson County in 1860.
